description:
Features:


Designed with small and exquisite appearance, it is convenient to carry.
640 * 480 resolution, high definition, beautiful in colors.
With AV input, it can connect with reversing camera, DVD, VCD etc.
With PAL/NTSC two systems, it supports two ways of video input V1, V2.
It can connect with car backing system.
It can be automatically turn to display when reversing.
Matched with a stand holder which has adhesive sticker in the bottom, so that you can stick it in

the car.
It can support multi-role display, suitable for reversing camera or reverse sensor.
High quality guatantee,good durability.

 

Specifications:


Screen size: 3.5"
Resolution: 640 * 480
Display format: 4:3
Power: less than 4W

Power supply: DC 12V
Video: 2 ways AV input reversing automatic display, AV signal automatic detection startup
System: PAL/NTSC 2 systems auto switch
Contrast: 350:1
Installation: install in the drive foreground
Working temperature: -20~50 degree
Standby temperature: -30~40 degree
Item weight: 132g
Item size: 10.5 * 6.5 * 1.5cm
Package size: 10 * 5.3 * 11.5cm
Package weight: 174g

 

 

Package including:


1 * LCD monitor
1 * Power line
1 * User manual
title: 3.5 Inch TFT LCD Monitor for Car / Automobile
